product_name: Bushnell SolarWrap Mini 100 Solar Power Charger
long_description: Portable and powerful, the Bushnell SolarWrap Mini 100 solar power charger gathers power from the sun and charge your USB-compatible mobile devices while you enjoy your outdoor adventure. Flexible and durable solar panel unrolls like a scroll when you want to collect solar power, and rolls up into a protective and easily transportable case when you're done. No sun? no worries-an internal lithium ion battery provides high-capacity power storage and features a micro USB input so it can be pre-charged at home. At a full charge, the internal battery provides enough power to charge most cameras and GPS units 2.5 times, MP3 players twice, or a smart phone once. 5-volt/1-amp power output provides the juice you need to charge most mobile devices. The Bushnell SolarWrap Mini 100 solar power charger fully charges in 4 hrs. via micro USB from a wall plug, and in approximately 10 hrs. in direct sunlight.
short_description: Portable and powerful, the Bushnell SolarWrap Mini 100 solar power charger gathers power from the sun and charge your USB-compatible mobile devices while you enjoy your outdoor adventure.
